story_summary: Alyosha visits the elder Father Zossima, who, contrary to Alyosha's fears, is sitting up and engaging joyfully with visitors. Father Zossima speaks tenderly to Alyosha about his brothers and shares a personal story about his own deceased elder brother, revealing deep spiritual reflections. The chapter also includes Father Zossima's thoughts on the importance of Scripture and teaching the Bible to the people, emphasizing faith and love.
